Identity Mirror

Separate your personal values from group expectations to identify potential drift.

Step 1: Choose your top 3-5 values

Select the values that matter most to you personally, regardless of what others think.

(0/3 selected)

Values related to protecting others from harm and promoting wellbeing

(0/3 selected)

Values related to individual freedom and resistance to oppression

(0/3 selected)

Values related to group membership, tradition, and social bonds
